it's a noice game to play with friends and kill time and do fun stuff.

L4D is an amazingly fun game and its a blast to play with friends. I don't know if I would personally play it by myself. But however I am really awful at most games, especially FPS and i never played them as a kid so I don't have a good grip over controls. But playing a campaign in this game taught me how to use camera controls and i think it opened up a new world for me to play more games with my wife & brother in law qwq. Totally would recommend if you are looking for a fun time! We bought this on sale, but I would pay way more for the amount of fun that ive had with it just in 5 hours : D

Great game, however for the same price you can get Left 4 Dead 2 which comes with Left 4 Dead 1s campagins, along with its own campaigns, Left 4 Dead 1 is great but I would recommend getting Left 4 Dead 2 instead.

What The Health Documentary

I purchased the game on sale. I've played a few hours so far and it has been an enjoyable experience so far. It was relatively cheap so no complaints at all.
I would definitely recommend picking it it up on sale. I bought it as a bundle so I received both Left 4 dead and Left 4 dead 2 as well.
I have only played it with a friend so cannot comment on the experience playing alone but I would imagine it would also be quite fun.

Looking forward to playing the sequel as well as the upcoming release Back 4 blood.

Not much content compared to Left 4 Dead 2, but it's fun seeing the differences of this version, compared to the newer game.

Plus, if you want a challenge, this game is preferrable over the 2nd game, however it's a much smaller playerbase compared to the 2nd game.

Na minha humilde opini√£o, melhor do que o 2. Jogo muito divertido e com muitas conquistas, da pra ficar horas sem nem ver o tempo passar.

Obs: Mais divertido com os amigos!
